DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose demonstrate bioequivalence naproxen administer VIMOVO manufacture new facility Sweden ( AstraZeneca ) naproxen administer VIMOVO manufacture USA ( Patheon ) market enteric-coated naproxen formulation .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Compare VIMOVO Manufactured AstraZenca AB VIMOVO Manufactured Patheon Pharmaceuticals Marketed Enteric-coated Naproxen Formulation
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Open-label , Randomised , 3-way Crossover Study demonstrate Bioequivalence Single Oral Dose Naproxen administer VIMOVO manufacture AstraZeneca AB compare VIMOVO manufacture Patheon Pharmaceuticals market enteric-coated Naproxen Formulation ( Manufactured Roche ) Healthy Volunteers .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female volunteer , age 18 55 year ( inclusive ) Female volunteer must nonpregnant nonlactating negative urine pregnancy test result prior enrolment study . Female volunteer childbearing potential must use appropriate birth control entire duration study Body mass index = 19 =30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) weight = 50 = 100 kg ( inclusive ) Volunteer likely unrecognized cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease , base history risk factor , clinical significant ECG find screen Uncontrolled hypertension define rest systolic pressure > 140 mmHg diastolic pressure > 90 mmHg screen admission Period 1 Presence prior history abnormal bleeding bleeding disorder , volunteer significant history peptic ulcer disease acid related gastrointestinal symptom Any gastrointestinal disease , abnormality gastric surgery may interfere gastric emptying , motility drug absorption
